column4: how do i fix this error "Busybox v1.1.3 (Debian 1.1.1.3-5ubunu7) Bult-in shell (ash) Enter help for a list of built in commands. (initramfs)" i am using wubi 8.04
that looks like a recovery shell.  Did you read the error(s) above those lines?
I assume you get that after you try and boot?  Have you tried running fsck?
sorry, I don't use/know anything about wubi, can't help you.
